svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - October 5 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
October 5, 2024" date: "2024-10-05"
Eth News and Links
Eth R&D protocol calls (All Core Devs)
• Eth R&D protocol call focused on consensus layer (ACDC #143): Pectra upgrade: Pectra-devnet-3 :
minor bugs being resolved Pectra-devnet-4 : open issue for EIP7685 execution layer requests on whether
to send requests or hashes Public testnet : planned for Devcon, Pectra-devnet-4 spec, name suggestions
wanted Blob increase : more data needed, engine_getBlobsV1 being implemented by client teams to help
stakers with low bandwidth
Eth R&D protocol call focused on consensus layer (ACDC #143):
• Pectra upgrade: Pectra-devnet-3 : minor bugs being resolved Pectra-devnet-4 : open issue for EIP7685
execution layer requests on whether to send requests or hashes Public testnet : planned for Devcon,
Pectra-devnet-4 spec, name suggestions wanted
Pectra upgrade:
• Pectra-devnet-3 : minor bugs being resolved
Pectra-devnet-3 : minor bugs being resolved
• Pectra-devnet-4 : open issue for EIP7685 execution layer requests on whether to send requests or
hashes
Pectra-devnet-4 : open issue for EIP7685 execution layer requests on whether to send requests or
• Public testnet : planned for Devcon, Pectra-devnet-4 spec, name suggestions wanted
Public testnet : planned for Devcon, Pectra-devnet-4 spec, name suggestions wanted
• Blob increase : more data needed, engine_getBlobsV1 being implemented by client teams to help
Blob increase : more data needed, engine_getBlobsV1 being implemented by client teams to help stakers
with low bandwidth
• Eth R&D protocol call focused on execution layer (ACDE) #197: Pectra upgrade scope: Included EIPs
(pectra-devnet-3 spec) : EIP2537 BLS precompile, EIP2935 historical block hashes in state, EIP6110
validator deposits onchain, EIP7002 execution layer triggerable exits, EIP7251 increase max effective
balance, EIP7549 committee index outside attestation, EIP7685 general purpose execution layer requests
& EIP7702 EOA account code for one transaction Considered for inclusion : EIP7623 increase calldata
cost, EIP7742 decouple blob count, EIP7762 increase min blob fee and a blob increase (needs more
analysis & concerns about stakers with low bandwidth) Fusaka upgrade scope : included EIP7594 PeerDAS
& EIP7692 EOF. No other EIPs will be scheduled for inclusion until there is a working Fusaka devnet
Amsterdam upgrade scope : Verkle EIPs considered for inclusion
Eth R&D protocol call focused on execution layer (ACDE) #197:
• Pectra upgrade scope: Included EIPs (pectra-devnet-3 spec) : EIP2537 BLS precompile, EIP2935
historical block hashes in state, EIP6110 validator deposits onchain, EIP7002 execution layer
triggerable exits, EIP7251 increase max effective balance, EIP7549 committee index outside
attestation, EIP7685 general purpose execution layer requests & EIP7702 EOA account code for one
transaction Considered for inclusion : EIP7623 increase calldata cost, EIP7742 decouple blob count,
EIP7762 increase min blob fee and a blob increase (needs more analysis & concerns about stakers with
low bandwidth)
Pectra upgrade scope:
• Included EIPs (pectra-devnet-3 spec) : EIP2537 BLS precompile, EIP2935 historical block hashes in
state, EIP6110 validator deposits onchain, EIP7002 execution layer triggerable exits, EIP7251 increase
max effective balance, EIP7549 committee index outside attestation, EIP7685 general purpose execution
layer requests & EIP7702 EOA account code for one transaction
Included EIPs (pectra-devnet-3 spec) : EIP2537 BLS precompile, EIP2935 historical block hashes in
• Considered for inclusion : EIP7623 increase calldata cost, EIP7742 decouple blob count, EIP7762
increase min blob fee and a blob increase (needs more analysis & concerns about stakers with low
bandwidth)
Considered for inclusion : EIP7623 increase calldata cost, EIP7742 decouple blob count, EIP7762
• Fusaka upgrade scope : included EIP7594 PeerDAS & EIP7692 EOF. No other EIPs will be scheduled for
inclusion until there is a working Fusaka devnet
Fusaka upgrade scope : included EIP7594 PeerDAS & EIP7692 EOF. No other EIPs will be scheduled for
• Amsterdam upgrade scope : Verkle EIPs considered for inclusion
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
• Blob increase proposal: Nixo: blob increase & solo staking Toni Wahrstätter: impact of blobs on
reorgs and analysis of solo staking & local block building Client optimizations to support blob
increases , engine_getBlobsV1 & IDONTWANT, followed by PeerDAS & ePBS
Blob increase proposal:
• Nixo: blob increase & solo staking
Nixo: blob increase & solo staking
• Toni Wahrstätter: impact of blobs on reorgs and analysis of solo staking & local block building
Toni Wahrstätter: impact of blobs on reorgs and analysis of solo staking & local block building
• Client optimizations to support blob increases , engine_getBlobsV1 & IDONTWANT, followed by PeerDAS
& ePBS
Client optimizations to support blob increases , engine_getBlobsV1 & IDONTWANT, followed by PeerDAS &
ePBS
• Data Always: case for increasing minimum blob base fee (EIP7762), makes blobspace market more
responsive to demand
Data Always: case for increasing minimum blob base fee (EIP7762), makes blobspace market more
• Consensus-specs v1.5.0-alpha.7
Consensus-specs v1.5.0-alpha.7
• Weekly testing call #7
Weekly testing call #7
Fusaka (Osaka + Fulu) upgrade
• PeerDAS: peerdas-devnet-2: launched but will need to be relaunched due to missing invalid sidecar
check PeerDAS breakout #9 : rebase on Pectra after pectra-devnet-4 PeerDAS & distributed blob building
: bottlenecks, optimizations, testing and impact on solo stakers
PeerDAS:
• peerdas-devnet-2: launched but will need to be relaunched due to missing invalid sidecar check
peerdas-devnet-2: launched but will need to be relaunched due to missing invalid sidecar check
• PeerDAS breakout #9 : rebase on Pectra after pectra-devnet-4
PeerDAS breakout #9 : rebase on Pectra after pectra-devnet-4
• PeerDAS & distributed blob building
PeerDAS & distributed blob building
• EOF implementers call #59 : release tests on top of Prague broken, discussed migration to Osaka
EOF implementers call #59 : release tests on top of Prague broken, discussed migration to Osaka
Amsterdam upgrade
• Stateless implementers call #25 (formerly Verkle): refining gas costs to support EIP7702, partial
witness charging and devnet-7 coming soon starting with local testing
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
• 🚨 Lido at 28.1% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
🚨 Lido at 28.1% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
• Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority Consensus layer:
Prysm 37% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
• Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
• Consensus layer: Prysm 37%
Consensus layer: Prysm 37%
• Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
• Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
• EIP7732 ePBS: Potuz: ePBS benefits , lower CPU & bandwidth requirements, less missed attestations,
less reorgs and no trusted intermediaries ePBS breakout #10 : steady progress by client teams, aiming
for devnet before Devcon
EIP7732 ePBS:
• Potuz: ePBS benefits , lower CPU & bandwidth requirements, less missed attestations, less reorgs and
no trusted intermediaries
Potuz: ePBS benefits , lower CPU & bandwidth requirements, less missed attestations, less reorgs and
• ePBS breakout #10 : steady progress by client teams, aiming for devnet before Devcon
ePBS breakout #10 : steady progress by client teams, aiming for devnet before Devcon
• IPv6 support by clients dashboard: most clients can use dual stack, IPv6 not enabled by default
IPv6 support by clients dashboard: most clients can use dual stack, IPv6 not enabled by default
• Flashbots: MEV searcher running in Intel TDX
Flashbots: MEV searcher running in Intel TDX
• Aestus Relay: MEV-Boost timing games as a service
Aestus Relay: MEV-Boost timing games as a service
For stakers
• EthStaker: solo staker bandwidth survey
EthStaker: solo staker bandwidth survey
• Contribute to Xatu data by running a xatu sentry sidecar on beacon node
Contribute to Xatu data by running a xatu sentry sidecar on beacon node
Research
• Fork-Choice enforced Inclusion Lists (FOCIL) workflow : roles & duties of inclusion list committee
members, nodes, proposers & attesters and edge case mitigations for equivocation, invalidation &
inclusion list stuffing
Fork-Choice enforced Inclusion Lists (FOCIL) workflow : roles & duties of inclusion list committee
• Terence: inclusion list out of protocol market risks
Terence: inclusion list out of protocol market risks
• Proposal to move state root to start of next block to reduce latency & increase throughput
Proposal to move state root to start of next block to reduce latency & increase throughput
• Tuyen optimization to aggregate multiple attestations over the same message
Tuyen optimization to aggregate multiple attestations over the same message
Client Releases
• Consensus layer: Nimbus v24.9.0 : adds support for additional beacon API endpoints and stability
fixes
Consensus layer:
• Nimbus v24.9.0 : adds support for additional beacon API endpoints and stability fixes
• Execution layer: Erigon v3.0.0-alpha4 : resync for better performance on chain-tip Geth v1.14.11 :
new docker images; v1.14.10 : hot fix for v1.14.9 blob pool regression Reth v1.0.8 : ExEx support for
experimental Engine API, RPC bug fixes & performance improvements
Execution layer:
• Erigon v3.0.0-alpha4 : resync for better performance on chain-tip
Erigon v3.0.0-alpha4 : resync for better performance on chain-tip
• Geth v1.14.11 : new docker images; v1.14.10 : hot fix for v1.14.9 blob pool regression
Geth v1.14.11 : new docker images; v1.14.10 : hot fix for v1.14.9 blob pool regression
• Reth v1.0.8 : ExEx support for experimental Engine API, RPC bug fixes & performance improvements
Reth v1.0.8 : ExEx support for experimental Engine API, RPC bug fixes & performance improvements
Layer 2
• Base 17 minute block building outage on September 21 due to sequencer cluster misconfiguration
Base 17 minute block building outage on September 21 due to sequencer cluster misconfiguration
• Growthepie L2 economics dashboard: revenue, costs, profit/loss, margin & blob data used
Growthepie L2 economics dashboard: revenue, costs, profit/loss, margin & blob data used
EIPs/Standards
• EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): Meta EIP7773 : Hardfork Meta - Amsterdam EIP7775 : BURN
opcode EIP7778 : Prevent block gas smuggling
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
• Meta EIP7773 : Hardfork Meta - Amsterdam
Meta EIP7773 : Hardfork Meta - Amsterdam
• EIP7775 : BURN opcode
EIP7775 : BURN opcode
• EIP7778 : Prevent block gas smuggling
EIP7778 : Prevent block gas smuggling
• ERCs (application layer): ERC7774 : Cache invalidation in ERC5219 mode web3 URL ERC7776 :
Transparent financial statements ERC7777 : Governance for human robot societies ERC7779 :
Interoperable delegated accounts ERC7780 : Validation module extension for ERC7579
ERCs (application layer):
• ERC7774 : Cache invalidation in ERC5219 mode web3 URL
ERC7774 : Cache invalidation in ERC5219 mode web3 URL
• ERC7776 : Transparent financial statements
ERC7776 : Transparent financial statements
• ERC7777 : Governance for human robot societies
ERC7777 : Governance for human robot societies
• ERC7779 : Interoperable delegated accounts
ERC7779 : Interoperable delegated accounts
• ERC7780 : Validation module extension for ERC7579
ERC7780 : Validation module extension for ERC7579
Stuff for developers
• Foundry: Forge-std v1.9.3 : adds cheatcodes publicKeyP256, pause/resumeTracing, resetGasMetering,
expectPartialRevert, setArbitraryStorage, copyStorage, mockFunction, assumeNoRevert, keyExists,
getArtifactPathByCode/DeployedCode, parseTomlType, skip with reason and random bool/bytes/int/uint
Foundry:
• Forge-std v1.9.3 : adds cheatcodes publicKeyP256, pause/resumeTracing, resetGasMetering,
• Hardhat v2.22.12 : ~10% performance improvement from internal Solidity tracing refactor
Hardhat v2.22.12 : ~10% performance improvement from internal Solidity tracing refactor
• Solidity bugs viewer organized by version
Solidity bugs viewer organized by version
• OpenZeppelin Contracts v5.1.0-rc.0 : reentrancy guard & ERC20 approval using transient storage, adds
Errors, Hashes, Packing, Panic & SlotDerivation utilities, adds P256 & RSA cryptographic primitives
and adds CircularBuffer, Heap & MerkleTree data structures
OpenZeppelin Contracts v5.1.0-rc.0 : reentrancy guard & ERC20 approval using transient storage, adds
• Multiproof v1 (Solidity library): generate Merkle proofs for testing in Foundry
Multiproof v1 (Solidity library): generate Merkle proofs for testing in Foundry
• Solgauss (Solidity library): statistical functions rationally approximated, includes erfc, erfinv,
erfcinv, ppf & and cdf
Solgauss (Solidity library): statistical functions rationally approximated, includes erfc, erfinv,
• Viem-deal : deal ERC20 tokens by manipulating account balance with setStorageAt
Viem-deal : deal ERC20 tokens by manipulating account balance with setStorageAt
• Halmos v0.2 : expands focus to finding bugs & exploits, adds cheatcode to generate calldata and adds
branching over symbolic call addresses
Halmos v0.2 : expands focus to finding bugs & exploits, adds cheatcode to generate calldata and adds
• Runtime Verification: formal verification of loops
Runtime Verification: formal verification of loops
• Patrick Collins: flash loans guide
Patrick Collins: flash loans guide
• RareSkills: common Solidity mistakes by beginners
RareSkills: common Solidity mistakes by beginners
• CTFs: Secureum RACE #33: answers to 8 question Solidity quiz
CTFs:
• Secureum RACE #33: answers to 8 question Solidity quiz
• Micro-eth-signer v0.12.0 : adds EIP7702 and EIP7495 SSZ stable container support
Micro-eth-signer v0.12.0 : adds EIP7702 and EIP7495 SSZ stable container support
• Bashquiat Discv5 in Bash
Bashquiat Discv5 in Bash
Security
• EF RFP: Pectra system contracts audit wanted for EIP2935, EIP7002 & EIP7251
EF RFP: Pectra system contracts audit wanted for EIP2935, EIP7002 & EIP7251
• Bedrock uniBTC $2M exploit on 8 chains via minting using native tokens
Bedrock uniBTC $2M exploit on 8 chains via minting using native tokens
• Onyx Protocol (Compound v2 fork) $3.8M exploit via unverified user input
Onyx Protocol (Compound v2 fork) $3.8M exploit via unverified user input
• Shezmu $4.9M exploit , funds recovered minus 20% bounty
Shezmu $4.9M exploit , funds recovered minus 20% bounty
• Banana Gun (Telegram trading bot) $3M exploit
Banana Gun (Telegram trading bot) $3M exploit
• Malicious VSCode Solidity extension
Malicious VSCode Solidity extension
Ecosystem
• Vitalik: legible Ethereum alignment using metrics of open source, open standards, decentralization &
security and positive sum
Vitalik: legible Ethereum alignment using metrics of open source, open standards, decentralization &
• ETHGlobal Singapore finalists
ETHGlobal Singapore finalists
Enterprise
• Visa tokenized asset platform : banks can issue fiat-backed stablecoins on public Ethereum, testing
only this year, BBVA expected to have live pilots in 2025
Visa tokenized asset platform : banks can issue fiat-backed stablecoins on public Ethereum, testing
• PayPal paid EY invoice using PYUSD stablecoin via SAP’s digital currency hub
PayPal paid EY invoice using PYUSD stablecoin via SAP’s digital currency hub
• PayPal enabled US business accounts to buy, hold, sell & transfer crypto
PayPal enabled US business accounts to buy, hold, sell & transfer crypto
Job Listings
• Sigma Prime is hiring Rust developers and security engineers. Remote roles !
Sigma Prime is hiring Rust developers and security engineers. Remote roles !
• Status free.technology is hiring a Business Developer . More jobs at IFT!
Status free.technology is hiring a Business Developer . More jobs at IFT!
• Nethermind InfoSec Head , Sr Dev , SRE Lead , Sr Embedded Dev & UX UI designer
Nethermind InfoSec Head , Sr Dev , SRE Lead , Sr Embedded Dev & UX UI designer
• Nomos is hiring Ecosystem Developer , Rust Engineer & Applied Researcher !
Nomos is hiring Ecosystem Developer , Rust Engineer & Applied Researcher !
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
• Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 2.5 to 76.7 gwei, 10.2 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3
gwei 11k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
• Gas: 2.5 to 76.7 gwei, 10.2 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei
Gas: 2.5 to 76.7 gwei, 10.2 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei
• 11k ETH net issuance this week
11k ETH net issuance this week
• ETHUSD : $2,316 - $2,701, currently $2,418, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $2,316 - $2,701, currently $2,418, all time high $4,878
• ETHBTC : currently 0.039 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.039 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
• Ethereum follow protocol (onchain social graph) live: follow & tag accounts
Ethereum follow protocol (onchain social graph) live: follow & tag accounts
• Drakula (iOS app): scrollable video feed, mint videos & trade memecoins on Base
Drakula (iOS app): scrollable video feed, mint videos & trade memecoins on Base
• ZKP2P Domains : trade web2 domains registered with Namecheap
ZKP2P Domains : trade web2 domains registered with Namecheap
• Azuki x Flashbots : tokenized delegation to make single tweet using Teleport
Azuki x Flashbots : tokenized delegation to make single tweet using Teleport
• Jelly Beans : guess the number (or lower) for future onchain events to win OP
Jelly Beans : guess the number (or lower) for future onchain events to win OP
Regulation/business/tokens
• Roman Storm motion to dismiss denied , trial scheduled for December
Roman Storm motion to dismiss denied , trial scheduled for December
• Inside Biden destroying crypto-friendly banks
Inside Biden destroying crypto-friendly banks
• US SEC end of fiscal year actions: TrustToken & TrueCoin settled for sale of TUSD Mango settled for
sale of MNGO tokens
US SEC end of fiscal year actions:
• TrustToken & TrueCoin settled for sale of TUSD
TrustToken & TrueCoin settled for sale of TUSD
• Mango settled for sale of MNGO tokens
Mango settled for sale of MNGO tokens

UK Gambling Commission prosecuting Sorare
General
• Ethereum obituaries : all the times Eth declared dead since 2014

• KrebsOnSecurity: Adam Iza allegedly bribed cops & stole from cybercriminals
KrebsOnSecurity: Adam Iza allegedly bribed cops & stole from cybercriminals
